source.text:
I hope you're having an amazing day & weekend Fam!

Happy Valentine's day to those that celebrate.

If you're not feeling too loved today know that God is the only valentine we ever need. He loves us thru the good and bad.

Stay Blessed.
Stay Strong. 
Stay on Fire for Life! ğŸ”¥

GM fam!

source.text:
ğŸš¨ Hey Fam. Got $40 from X payout monetization. Thank you @elonmusk

I've given away every dollar. Wanna give this $40 to someone who really needs it.

Pick number between 1-100 and put in comments. Earliest breaks tie.

I'll pick a # in 24 hours. 8pm PST

1 entry per account. ğŸ«¡ https://t.co/SKaUwCHKil

draft:
Just hit another small Bitcoin block reward from my home mining setup! ğŸ”¥

Instead of keeping it, gonna put it toward more Bitaxe units for the community
